```{r preliminaries}
if(!("topmodels" %in% installed.packages())) install.packages("topmodels", repos = "https://zeileis.R-universe.dev")
library("gamlss2")
```

Introduction on how to use the _topmodels_ package with _gamlss2_.

```{r}
library("gamlss2")
m <- gamlss2(dist ~ s(speed), data = cars)
library("topmodels")
proscore(m)
rootogram(m)
wormplot(m)
```
